## Lecturing

### is a process by which knowledge is transferred from the teacher [(expert)]{.yellow} to young learners[(students)]{.yellow}. Unfortunately, there is [no single magical formula]{.pink} for that but still quite possible by following a series of steps and procedures which I hope will be made part of this training.

## Lecturer Job {.scrollable}

::: {.incremental style="font-size: 1.1em;"}
Lessen student fears and encourage students to pursue deeper understanding

-   [Through several teaching and curriculum approaches]{.yellow}

-   integration during the class;

-   [expanded opportunities for two-way communication;]{.yellow}

-   developing co-ownership of the course along with the students;

-   [alternating lecture with small-group work to aid in learning difficult topics.]{.yellow}
:::
